flawed_nl_solution:
Emma’s sister is 7 + 9 = <<7+9=12>>12 years old.
In this many years, Emma’s sister will be 56 years old: 56 - 12 = <<56-12=44>>44 years.
When her sister is 56 years old, Emma will be 7 + 44 = <<7+44=51>>51 years.
#### 51

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 12. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
